title: Anime Stylized English Subtitles Batch 3 (100 Series and Movies)
description:
BATCH 3 is finally here!
I did some of your requests like the full version of Soul Eater and so forth.
I really put some effort this time to have a fuller version of the stylized subs.
100 SERIES and MOVIES.

All subtitles are meant to sync with their corresponding video file (you can see it in the sub names most times). You can try them with other anime files to see if they sync, but no guarantees there. You'll have to resync them most probably.

Help seed, comment, etc.

PLEASE READ THE NOTES INSIDE THE DOWNLOAD FOR INFO.

PURPOSE OF THIS DOWNLOAD:
- To have stylized subtitles that you can change any time to your liking.
- Most subs and corresponding videos are some of the best available for you to save and use should you ever need it.
- For the big anime fans that don't like boring, blocky subtitles that don't seem to fit with your show, now you can give your anime a little more life. To truly complete your favorite shows.
- Recommendations for shows you might want to check out
